reviews.text: Cheese steake egg rolls 100/10
Excellent  customer  service
Egg rolls amazing
The best Cheese steaks in NYC. Period ! Hands down!!!!!
Great service amazing food as well

Went here for a quick bite to eat for lunch. I ordered what I wanted over the phone. The menu prices are out dated but I've added a picture of the new menu and prices. Not much of a difference but its good to know what you are getting and how much it actually is.  The place ia small. And I dont say that as being a bad thing, just giving a description of the location. It's more a to go spot. No seating.  Looks like they are really busy so it made it that much better that I ordered on the phone. They said 15-20 minutes and It was ready when I got there! Okay so i had the tots, they were okay. Didn't taste greasy at all and they gave alot. 2 ppl can probably share depending on how hungry you are. I also tried the steak egg roll. I will start by saying I do not usually eat or like Chinese egg rolls.  However because these were steak ones I wanted to try them. It was pleasantly good! They had a different flavor then I've ever had but it was good! Now on to the reason I want to try thia place.  The steak sandwich!! It was really good! Plenty of meat, cheesy and the bread was nice and soft.its a nice spot to try in the bx. I would try it again.
The customer service was amazing
First time coming here. The atmosphere was cool & the cashier was very informed. The food is all made to order which is a plus for me
BANGIN.
This food is terrible
Best cheese steaks and a variety of options all of which taste amazing ......
Great store

We had the Philly cheese eggroll! Definitely a 10/10! I loved the experience, the food, the customer service of this establishment! If you‚Äôre ever in South Bronx, make sure you check out Jose at Papi‚Äôs!!!
Those cheesesteaks are BOMB!!!! If you are ever in NY, it‚Äôs a must try. Ask for Jose!!!
Came from Macon, GA. Visited while we were here in New York. Service was awesome. Treated us like family!! We loved it! Thank you.
So nice came all the way from Georgia

Egg rolls are amazing lemon pepper wings were great everything was good came back a day later

Tried it and it was okay. I was upset because the prices on the menu above my head did not match the prices of the physical menu. $5.00 for half and half was crazy and it was extremely sweet. I tried the Philly and chicken egg roll , one of each. Extremely small egg roll for $5.00 , smaller than the Chinese egg roll. Pairing the egg roll with chili sauce is diabolical . They have to do better. Fight broke out while I was waiting for my food , highly recommend going daylight hours, cause it‚Äôs definitely in the hood with no parking. Customer service was giving very much 2025. Cashier, FaceTiming while making orders and the two Mexican men in the back were in a conversation, while we all wait. I‚Äôve had better in New Jersey from a food truck. Local would be nice  , but this ain‚Äôt it. I will rather pay the toll and gas for Jersey

I had a fantastic experience at this establishment! Not only was the food absolutely delicious (the chicken cheesesteak was amazing!), but I was genuinely impressed by the level of cleanliness and attention to food safety. Before preparing my order, the cook thoroughly cleaned the stovetop because salmon had been cooked earlier. That extra step to prevent cross-contamination shows a true commitment to quality and customer care. Huge kudos to the cook working the grill today ‚Äî great job!üëèüèªüëèüèªüëèüèª
I‚Äôll definitely be coming back.
Amazing spiffy awesome service customer service family oriented the best in the South Bronx

Staff is friendly. I‚Äôve only had cheese steaks and buffalo chicken egg roll and onion rings here. Ima be honest. The pinion rings are trash, but the eggs rolls are delicious! If I could complain about them I wish they are a lil bigger. I don‚Äôt think they are over priced but by the time you finish them you want more lol. The flavor for the fillings are really good. They could be a bit more generous with the dipping sauce. My coworkers got the cheese steak and chopped cheese and they were satisfied. Ima try them on my next visit! If you‚Äôre in the area check them out

Really good

I got the steak taco plantain shell was so hard and burnt I couldn‚Äôt even eat it , took a bite felt like I was eating a rock , didn‚Äôt receive the order of fries , the steak sandwich had onions & pepper which we didn‚Äôt want ! Nice new addition to the neighborhood. I ordered a Salmon Chopped Cheese and I was more than satisfied. It was delicious! I got seasoned fries to go with it, they were a little undercooked so I tossed them in the air fryer for 5 mins & they were perfect. Customer service is outstanding. The owner was very hospitable and welcomed feedback. I will definitely be back‚Ä¶over & over again:)

Papi's was well needed it the BRONX! Continue to be Great Papiiiii !!!! Love this here

This is that authentic Philly you‚Äôve been looking for trust me. Food will have you hollering, just excellent. Went there with my people yesterday, had the 10inch Supreme Style Steak sandwich with Parmesan Garlic fries and tried one of the chicken steak eggroll‚Äôs and lemonade, All I have to say is IYKYK. Absolutely üî• üî• üî• they put thought into everything. Food is delicious and has that flavor and kick. Even the toppings are marinated. My boys both had regular philly‚Äôs as well and were all hyped after just their first bite. Thanks for the excellent service and food we will be coming back 200% to try everything else on the menu lol.
Food here is great. Always showing love. Late neighborhood food spot for sure. Take you and ya loved ones here
Best steak sandwich in the bronx area. Authentic home style flavors. Not your average sandwich from the corner store. This here is special , prepared fresh daily. You won‚Äôt regret it.

First and Foremost S/O to the Owner..wow this is my old stomping grounds..had to pull up show support..the chzstk and salmon chzstk was in point! The 6 inch is more of a 8 inch fr..just tell them to cut it in half lol..but other than that there official tissue..definitely a next time.

I was looking forward in coming here because they‚Äôre ratings were high but  unfortunately my experience was disappointing, I ordered the yuca fries it was overly greasy , The philly cheese steak was soggy and greasy, everything took about 15-20 mins for food that isn‚Äôt fresh nor was it even slightly good. Overall just wasn‚Äôt  worth it and I would not come back.

I tried the chicken and cheese steak egg rolls, a Philly cheese steak, garlic parmesan fries and wings, seasoned fries, chicken patacon and all the food was fresh also well seasoned I wasn't disappointed this is truly a hidden in the Bronx really good quality food.
The food here can cause addiction. The Cheesesteak eggrolls are a must have. I dare U to try 1...
